description:
Free childcare for ticket holders during select performances A collaboration with Monmouth Day Care Center While parents and guardians attend a performance, their children have creative fun engaging with childcare professionals in a safe environment onsite at Two River Theater! Play Dates will be offered for free during one Saturday matinee of every show in our 2024/25 season. For children aged 2 months and up. 

Book your tickets to the performance and fill out THIS FORM at least 72 hours before the Play Date to reserve your spot. Play Dates are staffed by accredited caregivers from Monmouth Day Care Center. Booking early helps us to fully staff this event with enough caregivers to accommodate different ages of children. Questions? Call 732-345-1400 x1812. 

About Monmouth Day Care Center: At Monmouth Day Care Center we are dedicated to providing a safe, stimulating environment for families seeking quality child care without regard to race, religion or economic status. Monmouth Day Care Center’s educational philosophy and curricula are derived from developmentally appropriate practice and the whole child philosophy. In 1987 Monmouth Day Care Center became the first child care center in Monmouth County and the eighth in New Jersey to receive accreditation from the National Association for the Education of Young Children. The Center continues to maintain this accreditation. In 2009 Monmouth Day Care Center entered into a partnership with the Red Bank Board of Education. In 2018 the Center received a star rating from the GROW NJ Kids Program, the 4th center in Monmouth County to receive this distinction. More information: http://www.monmouthdaycare.com/
htmlDescription:
PLAY DATES


Free childcare for ticket holders during select matinee performances.

A collaboration with Monmouth Day Care Center - While parents and guardians attend a performance, their children have creative fun engaging with childcare professionals in a safe environment onsite at Two River Theater!

Book your tickets to the performance at least 72 hours before the Play Date to reserve your spot. Once you book for this Play Date, a form which you need to fill out will be emailed to you. Play Dates are staffed by accredited caregivers from Monmouth Day Care Center. Booking early helps us to fully staff this event with enough caregivers to accommodate different ages of children. Questions? Call 732-345-1400 x1812.

About Monmouth Day Care Center: At Monmouth Day Care Center we are dedicated to providing a safe, stimulating environment for families seeking quality child care without regard to race, religion or economic status. Monmouth Day Care Center’s educational philosophy and curricula are derived from developmentally appropriate practice and the whole child philosophy. In 1987 Monmouth Day Care Center became the first child care center in Monmouth County and the eighth in New Jersey to receive accreditation from the National Association for the Education of Young Children. The Center continues to maintain this accreditation. In 2009 Monmouth Day Care Center entered into a partnership with the Red Bank Board of Education. In 2018 the Center received a star rating from the GROW NJ Kids Program, the 4th center in Monmouth County to receive this distinction. More information: Monmouth Day Care
name: Dial M for Murder Play Date

name: Dial M for Murder Pride Night

description:
Friday, March 7, 2025

6:45pm-8pm

Cost per person = $10

age 21 and over only

Pre-Show Event. Cocktail making class with Justin and Sondra in the library. Ticketed, $10. Alcohol to be served (21+). We'd like to offer a non-alcoholic version of each drink as well so I'll touch base with Sondra about getting those spirits.
htmlDescription:
Midcentury Cocktail Night


Artistic Director Justin Waldman will show off his mixology skills at this Midcentury Cocktail Night! This interactive class will guide you through the preparation of timeless favorites for an evening of 1950s cocktails/mocktails and memory making with friends.

This event is 21+. Non-alcoholic alternatives will be available.

Dial M for Murder 8PM performance tickets sold separately.
name: Midcentury Cocktail Night

description:
You are invited to the Spring Gala celebrating Two River Theater 

Saturday, May 3/2025 

6:00 PM 

  

Cocktails, light bites and performances on the Joan and Robert M. Rechnitz Theater stage 

Followed by Dinner & Dancing 

  

Cocktail attire 

Join Two River Theater for an immersive theatrical experience that celebrates our 31st anniversary season. Explore the theater with a reimagined journey, from cocktails on the Rechnitz stage to performers soaring overhead to a vaudevillian show that comes alive around you.  

 

Enjoy dinner with friends and fellow theater enthusiasts, where Two River Theater will honor its long-standing partnership with a local Community Partner by presenting the inaugural Spotlight Award. 

  

All proceeds of this event benefit the programs and services of Two River Theater. For more information on tickets and sponsorship packages, please contact Catherine Hill at chill@trtc.org or 732.345.1400 x 1820. 

 

Two River Theater is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.  Donations are tax-deductible to the fullest extent of the law less the value of goods and services received.
name: Spring Gala Individual Ticket
